ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, about Minime s idea for the members page (member profiles with pics and stuff), I think it could work. I m going to dedicate all my spare time this weekend

Ok, about Minime's idea for the members page (member profiles with pics and 
stuff), I think it could work. I'm going to dedicate all my spare time this 
weekend to getting the dang site up to date, and I could add that as well. 
Right now, I want to know who will be willing to contribute to it, because I 
don't really want to make it for only one person.

Anyways, if you're interested in contributing for this, email me (please 
don't use the eGroups personall message system, it doesn't work), and tell 
me. Thanx for your time everyone!
